## Description
Sewage water come into contact with fecal matter and potentially hosting harmful bacteria and disease-causing pathogens.&#10;&#9;&#9;Need special treatment to be useful.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Waste|
|Form:|Liquid|
